Outside the IGL Defense perimeter a bright red ball appears on the 
horizon, a tail behind the ball as well making it look like a comet. 
Quickly the being known as Hellpeon, now fully restored flys right 
over and past the IGL defenses heding towards the Oteybis. Meanwhile 
on the ship itself Demonite looks to one of the soldiers.

Demonite: "Where do we go to train...?"
